text: The Borșa is a left tributary of the river Someșul Mic in Romania. It discharges into the Someșul Mic in Răscruci. Its length is and its basin size is . The following rivers are tributaries to the river Borșa: *Left: Valea Rece, Fundături, Chidea, Bădești *Right: Cristorel, Șoimeni, Făureni, Giula ==References== * Trasee turistice – județul Cluj Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Cluj County
title: Borșa (river)
